utils

Class Grm

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Grm

  • public class Grm
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to setup the command and run the covariance engine. Currently done by calling an exteranl unix script file.

    The Covariance engine takes a file with a list of genoId's and creates a Grm from the geno's pedigree information and snip data.

    Author:
    Scott Smith

    • Constructor Detail

      • Grm

        public Grm(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> data,
   java.lang.String idColumn,
   java.lang.String rename,
   java.lang.String name,
   java.lang.String workDirectory,
   java.lang.String fileNameGenoType,
   java.lang.String fileNameHybridMap)
        Load asreml.config file.
        Parameters:
        data - - List of id's
        idColumn - - column name for id's
        rename - - //optional name if the file returned by the covariance engine should be renamed.
        name - - name of the file returned by the covariance engine
        workDirectory - - directory to write all Covariance engine files to
        fileNameGenoType - - File name of the file to write the id's found in the idColumn to.
        fileNameHybridMap - - File name of the mapping file returned by the Covariance engine

    • Method Detail

      • getGrmData

        public java.lang.Integer getGrmData(java.lang.String scriptFile,
                           boolean useTraited,
                           AsremlGlobals.GrmType grmType,
                           boolean useGenomic,
                           boolean bend)
        Parameters:
        scriptFile - - Location of script file to run the pedigree and covariance engine
        useTraited - - use the Traited version of the pedigree engine. Currently only used for multiyear
        grmType - - AsremlGlobals.GrmType
        useGenomic - - Set the covariance engine to use simialiarity data in the and return the H matrix
        bend - - Force the returned matrix to be positive definite.
        Returns:
        Number of levels for the collapsed hybrid map

      • postProcessFBKs

        public int postProcessFBKs(java.lang.String indexColumn,
                  AsremlGlobals.GrmType grmType)
        Read result file from the covariance engine. Currently written in the hybridMap.txt file where each line is "id grmIndex". Grm file is collapsed meaning more then one "id" can map to the same grmIndex. Reindexed grm values are stored in the colMap as "columnName"_index.
        Parameters:
        indexColumn - - Name of the Asreml Column
        grmType - - AsremlGlobals.GrmType
        Returns:
        - Total number of uncolapsed id's sent back from the covariance engine
